TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi sealed ResourcePool/TransactionEndDelegate extends System.MulticastDelegate
type ResourcePool.TransactionEndDelegate = delegate of obj -> unit

Docs.param: The object that is passed back to the delegate.
Docs.summary: Represents the method that handles the ending of a transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When you create a <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ResourcePool.TransactionEndDelegate> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
